page.title: 17Pets' Survey in Tremorfa.
page.content: 33% of people interviewed did not own a pet.Of the remaining two thirds who did own pets about 70% had one or more dogs.The next most popular pet was the cat.About 23% of pet owners had cats.Only two people had both cats and dogs.Other popular pets included;fish,budgerigars,and other birds such as racing pigeons. About 50% of these pet owners spent Â£3 to Â£4 per week on pet food;about 30% spent 50p to Â£3 per week on pet food while the rest spent as much as Â£5 per week on pet food.This is surprising and worth comparing since the average weekly wage is Â£100 per week.
